name: Lens
description:
In our latest monthly game, explore an underground scientific lab as Thea. She is a captured spy who through scientific experiments can shift into different wavelengths. 

In this puzzle platformer explore the world with a unique skill that creates fun and difficult puzzles.

_____________________________________________________________

Controls

wasd - Move around

space - Jump

i - Change to purple

o - Change to green

p - Change to blue

_____________________________________________________________
